text: Henry Dundas (1742–1811) was a Scottish advocate and Tory politician. Henry Dundas may also refer to: *Henry Dundas, 3rd Viscount Melville (1801–1876) *Henry Dundas, 7th Viscount Melville (1873–1935), Viscount Melville *Henry Dundas, 8th Viscount Melville (1909–1971), Viscount Melville *Henry Dundas (ship), several ships
title: Henry Dundas (disambiguation)
